forum.content:
Hello lads and lasses,

I am Billy and I just came back to Taiwan from Singapore. Before Singapore, I grew up in U.K. (Lived in U.K. For about 8/9years). I came back to Taiwan because I have to do my military service for a year, which I think it's a complete waste of time but anyways, my point is I need to make some friends in Taiwan, in return we can practice English; we can even hang out if you like.

Thanks for your time,
Billy.
forum.title: In need of some friends
